description: Independent research is offered for students dedicated to an in-depth research experience.
Emphasis is placed on the iterative process of experimentation and analysis.  Students interested
in independent research may enroll in BIO 297 or BIO 398.  Each course requires a faculty
supervisor, who will make the decision as to which course is appropriate.  Pass/No Pass.  Offered
each semester and during Interim.  Prerequisite: approval of instructor.
